Question: Owlet Bikes Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Owlet Bikes Inc.

Dream Sock

- FDA-cleared infant pulse oximetry solution
- Real-time health insights for parents and doctors
- Tracks pulse rate and oxygen saturation levels
- Provides real-time health notifications for low pulse rate, high pulse rate, and low oxygen

BabySat

- FDA-cleared device with hospital-grade accuracy
- Designed for infants 1-18 months and 6-30 lbs
- Monitors oxygen saturation and pulse rate
- Allows healthcare providers to set customizable alarms
- Supports insurance reimbursement and enhances care coordination
